MPM.content: “America is deconstruction” > no, we learn from deconstruction to suspend hasty attributions of proper names
necessary to think America w/ mad lucidity under the light of lunacy

FWT.content: denunciation of “political correctness” in U.S. is organized/manipulated by conservatives
censorship enforced by loss of job [capitalism] in America [re: movie Mr Death, Holocaust denier]

R.content: de Tocqueville sees America as having a sovereignty that acts circularly by itself with no operator or sovereign divided-off from it, or outside of it > “no authorities except w/in itself” [Rousseau’s Social Contract] [p. 15 pure actuality of Aristotle’s Prime Mover]

because of undecidability linked to autoimmune logic, can never “prove” whether it’s more democratic to include/exclude immigrants, vote/not vote directly, both protect democracy through some exclusion, some renvoi
rogue state is whoever U.S. says it is [Chomsky]
United States, w/out consulting anyone, gives itself the right to protect its “vital interests”
[Derrida on 9/11]: not as unforeseeable as everyone claimed; the trauma that occurred, not what actually happened, but apprehension of a worse threat still to come

DPi.content: in U.S., argument is about a good and tolerable DP
however powerless, in U.S. you find most vigilant & best informed forces of protest [re: abolitionism?]
in U.S., history of civil rights & slavery part of history of DP (also overarming incomparable to other nations)

U.S. (& China) will come under more pressure to end DP [?]; p. 80 apparent teleology of abolition movement seems to tend toward international criminal court (to which states consent to abandon sovereignty) > long way off
re: U.S., who can deny DP as political justice is class justice

PF.content: feeble prejudice, obscurantist disavowal that claims deconstruction found its only or its best welcome in U.S.

HLP.content: Derrida likes U.S. phrase “civil disobedience” (Thoreau), that respectable tradition where raison d’état does not dispense last word in ethics
resist positive laws (not all laws), laws that betray their own foundation

PJP.content: U.S. more obsessed w/ perjury than any other Western Country
most vulgar forms of media violence—link btwn television, University, and “American law” [Trump]
Bill Clinton’s perjury first private (infidelity), then public (“what ‘is’ is”)

PSSS.content: American hegemony at once obvious & more critical/vulnerable re: globalization, worldwide-ization underway
U.S. in crisis w/ DP [?] (also, U.S. ostracizing Freudian psychoanalysis)

LI.content: American professors 2nd to none in knowledge of migrations, wanderings (déplacements)
no “completeness” where freeplay is concerned > freeplay an inadequate translation of jeu (& network connected to it): “freeplay” [in deconstruction] greatly overestimated in U.S.

CF.content: Derrida on nefarious [my word choice] Bill and Hillary Clinton

BSi.content: events of 9/11: know-how of archive, technical reproducibility part of event (political-economy/power of media) > knowing how to cause fear, making known: virtuality of the worst
no capital w/out accredited fable > w/ real effects [logic of market part of logic of war]
from Chomsky, U.S. military tactics purposely out of control to seem blind, seem crazy, like an animal

EU.content: Latin, then American English: privileged media of philosophical or techno-scientific communication
double keeping of memory & chance (invagination of inside pocket); truth, Wahrheit, what keeps, calls upon [us] to watch faithfully, on coat of arms of American universities

FV.content: full speech, contracts only w/ itself, system of truth > Lacan not proposing crude readjustment [i.e. American psychology] but rarity à la Heideggerian Eigentlichkeit

WBH.content: guardians of institution are guardians of Law > as women’s studies gains institutional legitimacy, it produces guardians of the Law; U.S. is a pioneer of women’s studies
U.S. more faithful to 19th century model of University than most European countries

resistance opposed to deconstruction same as one opposed to woman’s studies, “something sexual at stake in the resistance to deconstruction,” deconstruction successful in U.S. among homosexuals, feminists
receiver as determining factor of gift, one who responds, performativity of text produces receiver w/out pre-existing [him/her/it]
Declaration of Independence signed by God, signs American people into existence, they didn’t exist before it
it is by the gift that Law is produced, the signature engenders sender, receiver, signer
